extendedInfo.description: Ever wonder what it would be like to have your very own star trek workstation? Now you can with this Star Trek LCARS style Live Wallpaper.The Star Trek Live Wallpaper looks fantastic on tablets of any size and you can scroll through the wallpaper on phones to get the full experience.Press the buttons to watch the Live Wallpaper change or customize up to 30 of them to open the apps of your choice.Check out the settings to see all of the ways you can customize the live wallpaper.***If you are using a Samsung GS2 or GS3 you might need to set the live wallpaper using a third party launcher, like "Go Launcher", to get the home screen to scroll over the whole wallpaper. Or set Manual Scrolling under the advanced section of the apps settings.***Keywords: startrek, star trek, live wallpaper, livewallpaper, lcars, l.c.a.r.s. ,warp reactor, exitbrain, tablet

reviews.title: Great live wallpaper
reviews.comment: Could do with being able to use federation logo as app drawer on launchers like nova etc
reviews.author: steve marshall

reviews.title: Note 10.1
reviews.comment: Brilliantly customisable, if only it could make my apps themed too.
reviews.author: Calum the-earl-of-devonshire

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is something I always wanted as a kid.  Best live wallpaper ever!
reviews.author: Matthew Boettcher

reviews.title: Alcatel onetouch
reviews.comment: Worked on my other phone now buttons don\'t, sound starts enytime, liked it before.
reviews.author: Andrew Nairne White

reviews.title: The Best Star Trek Live Wallpaper
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic app, nothing out there is better! However, what I would like to see in future updates is the ability to program the buttons to open folders instead of just individual apps.   EDIT: I just upgraded to the Nexus 7 (2013) and this wallpaper now runs so slow? Which doesn\'t make sense in my head, this device has twice the RAM and a faster processor then my old tablet. So I\'m not sure what to do about it? Please fix if possible? I love this app. Maybe it\'s just not optimized for 4.3 JB yet?
reviews.author: Nolan Sager

reviews.title: Only one thing keeping this from 5 stars
reviews.comment: This is a great LWP. It would be perfect if the Star Date was correct. It is totally inaccurate in its current state. It would be nice if all the buttons could be customized, but that\'s not as important as having an accurate Star Date reading. Still a great start though.
reviews.author: Theodis Wright

reviews.title: Love It, Couldn\'t Not Use It Anymore
reviews.comment: LOVE every feature so far, been using this for a year!  Adding more options for the moving display screen would be cool, really dig the starfield & particle accelerator though so far!   My buttons are all customized, and make the cool classic noises when I open my apps!  Keep expanding on the idea, maybe even develop a LCARS operating system! Hahah, cool beans Comrades.
reviews.author: Alexander Stone

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: A must for any Star Trek fan. Totally worth it. Dev you made me one happy treker.  Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Daniel Michaels

reviews.title: No refund button
reviews.comment: Tried it out, it\'s not a bad app, just too busy for me. Went for refund, no refund button less than 5 minutes after purchase! Boo!
reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: This is an awesome live wallpaper. The only gripe I have is it doesn\'t come with a galaxy class.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Suggestion, can you set the yellow and red alerts to correlate with the battery status? That would rock!
reviews.author: Tobias ReLLiK

reviews.title: Awesome trekkie app!
reviews.comment: love this app works great! my only complaint is I wish the buttons were a little bigger.
reviews.author: FairytaleVideobiz

reviews.title: Customization
reviews.comment: Any chance we could have the option of customizing the text boxes to the left of the center buttons and down to the right from there?  Being able to get rid of or change the numbers in the field at the far bottom right (under the reactor) would be good too. And could warp speed change brightness or volume without animating?
reviews.author: David Hedrick

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: I highly recommend this interactive wallpaper to everyone. It\'s fantastic. Thank you exitbrain.
reviews.author: Chris Connors

reviews.title: Priority One Message
reviews.comment: :) Gene Rodenberry would be proud this app \"BOLDLY GOES WHERE NO APP HAS GONE BEFORE\" I would rate it infinaty stars however this would be illogical as infinity is not a number may the makers of this app live long and prosper
reviews.author: Hikaru Newman Hunter

reviews.title: Samsung 10.1
reviews.comment: Beautiful interface,  fully customizable buttons. Love it.
reviews.author: Mick Beaman

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: For something as simple as a live wallpaper, this does a lot. Very customizable. Flawless on my HTC One.
reviews.author: Walter Olsen

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Try it and enjoy it. Trek heaven.
reviews.author: Whitney Engeran

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Stardates aren\'t accurate it was telling me the stardate 23544.8  today and that would be  November 23 1945 2:21 am
reviews.author: Hans Hartog

reviews.title: Love it. Just one question
reviews.comment: Love the app. It\'ll be on here for a while, and it will definitely be on my tablet once I get one.  Just one question, though: How is the stardate calculated?
reviews.author: Christian Jasper
